moves.name: Brine
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the target’s HP is at half or below.

moves.name: Grand Illusion!
moves.effect: Activates the Status Condition Reflection effect on the allied field of play. Makes the user able to endure the next hit it takes.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.effect: The user takes up a counterattacking posture. Using this move again will cause the user to leave this posture. No other actions can be taken while in this posture. The user will attack if hit by a special move while it is in this counterattacking posture, then the user leaves this posture. The more damage the user has taken from the opponent’s move, the greater the power of this move.

syncMove.name: Aquatic Prince Hydro Pump
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is trapped.

passives.name: Stationary Target 5
passives.description: Powers up moves when the target is trapped.

passives.name: Pokey Trap 5
passives.description: Increases the amount of damage the target takes from being trapped.

passives.name: Recuperation 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP after using a sync move.
